definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: Of course, in the end these dark moments help make the happy ending feel all the sweeter.
sentences.chinese: 當然這些“杯具”最終會成爲大團圓結局的甜點。

sentences.english: And then we'll have family reunion dinner.
sentences.chinese: 接着，我打算和家人喫團圓飯。

sentences.english: Every family, Ann demons and ghosts.
sentences.chinese: 家家戶戶燒紙錢，安鬼平和鬼團圓。

sentences.english: Comedy, eclogue withtheprototype of reunited poem.
sentences.chinese: 喜劇，牧歌和團圓詩的原型。

sentences.english: Of course, it's a happily-ever-after story.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這是個大團圓結局的故事。

sentences.english: The Mid-autumn Festival, one of the reunion holidays for Chinese families, fell on September 12th.
sentences.chinese: 中秋節，一箇中國閤家團圓的假日，落在9月12日。

sentences.english: Southern Song Dynasty, to speak of a moon-phase gifts, take the meaning of reunion.
sentences.chinese: 南宋，民間以月餅相贈，取團圓之義。

sentences.english: Many people, instead of driving, took trains home for family reunions.
sentences.chinese: 很多人改搭火車回家團圓。

sentences.english: However, there are not always happy endings with other cases of .
sentences.chinese: 不過，也有不與其他案件的總是大團圓的結局。

sentences.english: On the last day of the lunar year, there is a big familydinner。
sentences.chinese: 陰曆年的最後一天，通常要喫一頓豐盛的團圓飯。

sentences.english: We had a sumptuous feast of reunion.
sentences.chinese: 我們吃了一頓豐盛的團圓飯。

sentences.english: Not only nine sister and four xi to reunion, everyone returned to the earth.
sentences.chinese: 不僅九妹和四喜得以團圓，大家也都回到了人間。

sentences.english: The family side of the rewards that big round moon while eating family dinner.
sentences.chinese: 全家人一邊賞那又大又圓的月亮，一邊喫着團圓飯。

sentences.english: Go out in the outside, is bound to get home for family reunion dinner.
sentences.chinese: 出門在外的人，必定要趕回家喫團圓飯。

sentences.english: Then they moved on to the United States to join Simic’s father.
sentences.chinese: 之後，他們抵達美國，與父親團圓。

sentences.english: In china, people might leave work early to celebrate with a family dinner.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，上班人可以提前下班，全家人一起喫團圓飯。
